items.title: Dental Checkup
items.summary: The annual dental check-up was conducted in Little Hearts by Dr Rachayta Gala. The children are screened for dental issues and provided Fluoride treatment. The doctor also conducted a session…
items.content_html: The annual dental check-up was conducted in Little Hearts by Dr Rachayta Gala. The children are screened for dental issues and provided Fluoride treatment. The doctor also conducted a session for the parents about maintaining dental hygiene for the children and how to avoid cavities.

items.title: Entering Puberty
items.summary: Puberty workshop was conducted by Dr. Tanuja Monesh Prem, a reputed professional working in the field of special needs.
items.content_html: Puberty workshop was conducted by Dr. Tanuja Monesh Prem, a reputed professional working in the field of special needs.

items.title: Legal Guardianship
items.summary: This workshop for parents was conducted in the month of January. Professionals from Sopan Trust conducted the session on legal guardianship for special needs children.
items.content_html: This workshop for parents was conducted in the month of January. Professionals from Sopan Trust conducted the session on legal guardianship for special needs children.

items.title: Summer Camp
items.summary: The summer camp was organised in the month of April with various activities and games for the children.
items.content_html: The summer camp was organised in the month of April with various activities and games for the children.

items.title: Sensory Week
items.summary: Sensory week is conducted in the last week of the academic year. Kids look forward to this activity.
items.content_html: Sensory week is conducted in the last week of the academic year. Kids look forward to this activity.

items.title: Birthdays
items.summary: Every month is special as we celebrate the birthdays of our students. Cakes are not just eaten but also made by the students as part of the celebration.
items.content_html: Every month is special as we celebrate the birthdays of our students. Cakes are not just eaten but also made by the students as part of the celebration.

items.title: Holi
items.summary: The kids enjoy Holi as they get to play in water. An inflatable bathtub is set up for the celebration.
items.content_html: The kids enjoy Holi as they get to play in water. An inflatable bathtub is set up for the celebration.

items.title: Staff Picnic
items.summary: The staff went for an overnight picnic to Banayan Bliss homestay in Khopoli. It was a great bonding experience.
items.content_html: The staff went for an overnight picnic to Banayan Bliss homestay in Khopoli. It was a great bonding experience.

items.title: Picnic
items.summary: The students are taken for 2 picnics in a year. One is an indoor venue. They enjoy outings and activities together.
items.content_html: The students are taken for 2 picnics in a year. One is an indoor venue. They enjoy outings and activities together.

items.title: Annual Sports Day
items.summary: Little Hearts, for the 1st time, organised a spectacular sports day. It was a memorable event for the children and staff.
items.content_html: Little Hearts, for the 1st time, organised a spectacular sports day. It was a memorable event for the children and staff.
